name: Boom Bits
description: Boom Bits is a single-player shoot-em-up set in the distant future where humans have been forced to leave the planet. You must protect the cargo and get to the launch site.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Internet Connection Suggested
